sense.gloss: to break (into pieces), to smash, to crush, to shatter, to grind (into powder), to pound
to shatter (someone's hopes, confidence, etc.), to crush, to frustrate
to simplify, to make easy to understand

sdata.j: ↑愛↑↓あい↓は↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑心↑↓こころ↓を|↑砕↑↓くだ↓く|こともできるのさ。
sdata.e: But love can break your heart.

sdata.j: ピックは↑硬↑↓かた↓い↑地表↑↓ちひょう↓を|↑砕↑↓くだ↓く|ために↑用↑↓もち↓いられる↑長↑↓なが↓い↑取↑↓と↓っ↑手↑↓て↓の↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓だ。
sdata.e: A pick is a long handled tool used for breaking up hard ground surfaces.
